id.description: The unique identifier for the channel. It is automatically generated, you should not change it unless you know what you are doing.

name.description: The name for the channel. If not provided, the name of the channel will be the name of the file.

topic.description: (Optional) The channel topic displayed at the top.

slow_mode.description: The slow mode delay for the channel.

hide_threads_after.description: The duration after which threads in this channel automatically archive.

role.description: The role to apply the permissions to.

permissions.description: (Optional) Permissions for this role within this channel.

description: Defines a text channel for the Discord server.
